universum.studios.android.device.storage

Enum Storage.Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Storage.Unit>
      • universum.studios.android.device.storage.Storage.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<Storage.Unit>
    Enclosing interface:
    Storage

    public static enum Storage.Unit
extends Enum<Storage.Unit>
    Represents unit to measure files on an Android device's file system.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description

      Storage unit size of one bit.
      B

      TB

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long bits
      Amount of bits represented by this storage unit.

      Amount of bytes (bits / 8) represented by this storage unit.

      Full name of this storage unit.

        for (Storage.Unit c : Storage.Unit.values())

      • valueOf

        public static Storage.Unit valueOf(String name)
        Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name. The string must match exactly an identifier used to declare an enum constant in this type. (Extraneous whitespace characters are not permitted.)
        Parameters:

      • formatBits

        public float formatBits(long bits)
        Formats the given amount of bits to format specific for this storage unit.

        For example, Unit.MB.formatBits(8388608) will result in 1 which can be printed as 1 MB.

        Parameters:
        bits - The amount of bits to format to this storage unit's representative value.
        Returns:
        Formatted representative value of this storage unit for the given amount of bits.
        See Also:
        formatBytes(long)

      • formatBytes

        public float formatBytes(long bytes)
        Formats the given amount of bytes to format specific for this storage unit.

        For example, Unit.MB.formatBytes(1048576) will result in 1 which can be printed as 1 MB.

        Parameters:
        bytes - The amount of bytes to format to this storage unit's representative value.
        Returns:
        Formatted representative value of this storage unit for the given amount of bytes.
        See Also:
        formatBits(long)
